title: Microsoft Office 2013 SP1 Volume AIO x86 x64 en-US
description:
murphy78 presents Microsoft Office 2013 SP1 VL AIO
This iso contains both x86 and x64 installers for:

Professional Plus
Project Pro
Visio Pro

MSDN Retail combo source:
en_office_professional_plus_2013_with_sp1_x86_and_x64_dvd_3928186.iso

VL x86 Sources:
SW_DVD5_OFFICE_PROFESSIONAL_PLUS_2013W_SP1_W32_ENGLISH_MLF_X19-35821.ISO
SW_DVD5_PROJECT_PRO_2013W_SP1_W32_ENGLISH_MLF_X19-35750.ISO
SW_DVD5_VISIO_PRO_2013W_SP1_W32_ENGLISH_MLF_X19-36365.ISO

VL x64 Sources:
SW_DVD5_OFFICE_PROFESSIONAL_PLUS_2013W_SP1_64BIT_ENGLISH_MLF_X19-35976.ISO
SW_DVD5_PROJECT_PRO_2013W_SP1_64BIT_ENGLISH_MLF_X19-35816.ISO
SW_DVD5_VISIO_PRO_2013W_SP1_64BIT_ENGLISH_MLF_X19-36393.ISO

Release file:
Office-2013-Professional-Plus-2013-with-SP1-x86-and-x64-en-US-with-ProjectPro-and-Visio-VL-builds.iso
Size: 2.94 GB
SHA1: E2DF306DDD4677E3ED63F2C0E5ACACC9DD4D558F

This is pretty self-explanatory. I took the retail combo disc, dumped the
x86 and x64 folders and tossed in the VL versions. I then tossed in the
Project Pro and Visio pro contents to give the option to install those as well.

Setup Options: <a href="
http://bayimg.com/baMCaaAFe" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/baMCaaAFe</a>

MTK Activation: <a href="
http://bayimg.com/BAMcbaAFE" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/BAMcbaAFE</a>

murph-note:
-I tried to make a svf patch to the Retail version I made, but it
was almost the same size as the iso, so it's not worth bothering. Nobody seeds
retail versions because there's no way to activate them.
-I have not played with language switching, though there are language packs
readily available on MS download center for Office 2013 sp1. AFAIK you can
just install them after installing the Office software program(s).
-I have tested every install, uninstall, activation, and program. Everything
seems to be working just fine. I have not experienced any issue.
-I have included MTK 2.5.1 that CODYQX4 released today, but if you experience
problems with some of the newer features or using this on a newer OS build,
you should check for a newer version of MTK.

MTK project page is at: <a href="
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/28669-Microsoft-Toolkit-Official-KMS-Solution-for-Microsoft-Products" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.mydigitallife.info/threads/28669-Microsoft-Toolkit-Official-KMS-Solution-for-Microsoft-Products</a>

Credits:
CODYQX4 - Microsoft Toolkit activation program

Enjoy Pirates,
